name: Beneficiary Designations
description: Having a valid will in place isn’t enough. Assets you pass on outside of your will are called non-probate assets. They include lRAs, 401(k)s, pensions, life insurance policies, and certain bank and brokerage accounts. If beneficiaries are properly set for these non-probate assets(opens in new window), ownership can transfer faster than your assets that must go through probate.

howToGetIt: Apply online - All forms/services are online.
